input:
Inter 1 - 2 Juventus

First Half:

10:16 Caption: Rodrigo Palacio (Inter) tries to send a pass but it's blocked.

10:38 Caption: Xherdan Shaqiri (Inter) delivers a lovely cross into the penalty area. Nevertheless, an opposition defender is alert and averts the danger with a brilliant clearance. Inter win a corner.
10:43 Event: Shots off target by Inter
10:47 Caption: The resulting corner from Xherdan Shaqiri (Inter) is cleared by the defence.
11:58 Caption: Rodrigo Palacio (Inter) serves up a nice cross, but the defence clears the danger.
12:19 Event: Foul by Inter
12:30 Caption: Marcelo Brozovic (Inter) commits a rough challenge and Daniele Doveri blows his whistle for a foul.
12:36 Event: Indirect free-kick by Juventus
13:29 Event: Ball out of play
13:31 Caption: Alvaro Morata (Juventus) put a cross into the box which wasn't a bad decision, but he failed to achieve what he wanted as none of his teammates managed to meet it. The ball goes out of play and Inter will have a goal kick.
13:47 Event: Clearance by Inter
14:15 Event: Shots off target by Inter
14:21 Caption: Marco Storari gets a well deserved ovation! Mauro Icardi (Inter) produces a decent first-time strike towards the top right corner, but the goalkeeper is positioned well to block it. Nice goalkeeping skills.
14:54 Event: Ball out of play
15:07 Event: Throw-in by Inter
15:51 Caption: Marcelo Brozovic (Inter) attempts to find his teammate with a pass from outside the box, but the opposition's defence is quick to react and thwarts the attack.
16:04 Event: Ball out of play
16:28 Event: Throw-in by Juventus
16:30 Caption: Great teamplay by Inter as they control the ball with a lot of short passes. Patience is the key if they want to find a gap in the defence to score.
16:42 Event: Ball out of play
16:50 Event: Clearance by Juventus
17:59 Event: Ball out of play
18:15 Event: Throw-in by Inter
18:29 Caption: A pass from Marcelo Brozovic (Inter) is intercepted by Marco Storari and the move breaks down.
19:21 Event: Ball out of play
19:37 Caption: Stephan Lichtsteiner (Juventus) goes on a solo run, but he fails to create a chance as an opposition player blocks him. The ball is out of play. A goal-scoring opportunity from a corner for Juventus.
19:48 Event: Corner by Juventus
19:52 Caption: Claudio Marchisio (Juventus) decides to speed play up with a short corner kick.
19:56 Event: Ball out of play
20:17 Event: Clearance by Inter
20:55 Caption: Stephan Lichtsteiner (Juventus) plays a dangerous chip pass into the box in an attempt to set up one of his teammates, but the effort is intercepted by one of the defenders.
21:17 Caption: Stephan Lichtsteiner (Juventus) whips the ball in, but it fails to reach any of his teammates as the opposition's defence averts the threat.
21:43 Event: Shots off target by Juventus
21:43 Event: Ball out of play
21:48 Caption: Alvaro Morata (Juventus) wasted a huge opportunity! The fans already began to celebrate as he unleashed a powerful shot from the edge of the box after a brilliant solo effort. The ball went towards the left side of the goal, but Samir Handanovic made a crucial save! Juventus will take a corner kick.
22:14 Event: Corner by Juventus
22:35 Caption: Nothing comes of the resulting corner from Claudio Marchisio (Juventus). The defence is alert and manages to cut it out.
23:24 Event: Shots on target by Inter
23:29 Event: Ball out of play
23:35 Caption: Rodrigo Palacio (Inter) gets to the rebound inside the box and shoots to the bottom left corner, but his sidefooter is blocked by an alert Marco Storari. What a save!
23:38 Event: Throw-in by Inter
23:44 Event: Ball out of play
23:50 Caption: Daniele Doveri has a clear sight and sees a foul from Romulo (Juventus).
24:42 Event: Ball out of play
24:49 Caption: Marcelo Brozovic (Inter) sends a lofted cross into the box which is headed clear. The referee signals a corner kick to Inter.
25:06 Caption: Xherdan Shaqiri (Inter) will try to find the head of one of his teammates from a corner kick.
25:14 Event: Corner by Inter
25:16 Event: Foul by Inter
25:27 Caption: Daniele Doveri blows his whistle and it's Juan Jesus (Inter) who is penalised for an offensive foul. Good decision by the referee.
25:46 Event: Indirect free-kick by Juventus
26:20 Caption: Rodrigo Palacio (Inter) tries to slide the ball through to a teammate but it's well blocked by a defender.
26:43 Event: Shots on target by Juventus
26:48 Caption: Stefano Sturaro (Juventus) fashions a shot from the edge of the box after receiving an accurate pass. Samir Handanovic makes a stunning save to stop the effort from flying into the right side of the goal.
26:52 Event: Foul by Juventus
26:52 Caption: Stefano Sturaro (Juventus) shows too much aggression during an attacking move and ends up fouling his opponent.
27:12 Event: Indirect free-kick by Inter
28:16 Event: Ball out of play
28:22 Event: Throw-in by Inter
28:45 Event: Ball out of play
28:53 Event: Throw-in by Inter
29:37 Caption: Marcelo Brozovic (Inter) whips a promising cross into the box, but the opposition's defence intercepts the ball.
29:52 Caption: Xherdan Shaqiri (Inter) delivers a long ball, but it lacks enough power to reach his teammates and is intercepted by one of the defenders.
30:26 Caption: Good defending. Xherdan Shaqiri (Inter) tries to find Mauro Icardi inside the box, but the pass is cut out.
32:02 Caption: Danilo D'Ambrosio (Inter) fails to send a pass into the box as his effort is cut out.
32:07 Event: Foul by Inter
32:13 Event: Yellow card by Inter
32:28 Caption: Today's referee Daniele Doveri rightly decides to book Andrea Ranocchia (Inter) for his harsh tackle.
32:40 Event: Indirect free-kick by Juventus
32:53 Event: Foul by Inter
32:55 Caption: Claudio Marchisio (Juventus) tries to take the opposition by surprise with a quick free kick into the box.
32:58 Caption: Marcelo Brozovic (Inter) makes a rough challenge and Daniele Doveri blows his whistle for a foul.
33:06 Event: Indirect free-kick by Juventus
33:08 Event: Offside by Juventus
34:22 Event: Foul by Inter
34:31 Event: Yellow card by Inter
34:45 Caption: Marcelo Brozovic (Inter) has tested the patience of referee Daniele Doveri and goes into the book for a previous late challenge.
35:01 Event: Indirect free-kick by Juventus
35:06 Caption: Claudio Marchisio (Juventus) quickly takes the free kick with a short pass.
35:25 Event: Foul by Inter
35:29 Event: Indirect free-kick by Juventus
35:32 Caption: The referee blows his whistle as Danilo D'Ambrosio (Inter) was too aggressive in his challenge. Simone Padoin (Juventus) takes a short free kick.
37:11 Event: Ball out of play
37:20 Event: Throw-in by Inter
38:08 Event: Shots off target by Inter
38:14 Event: Offside by Inter
38:15 Caption: OFF THE CROSSBAR! Xherdan Shaqiri (Inter) runs towards the goal to give his teammate support. He receives a fantastic pass and shoots from the edge of the box, but it crashes against the crossbar. It could have been a brilliant goal, unlucky.
38:39 Event: Indirect free-kick by Juventus
38:50 Caption: Gooal! No wait, it's been ruled out for offside. Marcelo Brozovic (Inter) disagrees, but the linesman is sure about his call.
39:02 Event: Ball out of play
39:23 Event: Clearance by Inter
39:46 Event: Foul by Juventus
39:50 Caption: Lovely cross from Stephan Lichtsteiner to find Roberto Pereyra (Juventus) deep in the box, but he steers his header well wide of the left post. The ball is off of the pitch and it's a goal kick for Inter.
39:56 Event: Indirect free-kick by Inter
40:10 Caption: Daniele Doveri blows his whistle after Nemanja Vidic (Inter) brings one of his opponents down with a strong tackle. It's a penalty to Juventus! Let's see who's going to take it.
40:40 Event: Foul by Inter
40:40 Caption: The whistle is blown for an infringement and Nemanja Vidic (Inter) receives a yellow card!
40:49 Event: Yellow card by Inter
41:10 Caption: Claudio Marchisio (Juventus) is going to take the penalty!
41:25 Caption: Claudio Marchisio (Juventus) scores from the penalty spot after firing the ball into the bottom left corner to give the goalkeeper no chance!
41:53 Event: Shots on target by Juventus
41:53 Event: Penalty by Juventus
41:54 Event: Goal by Juventus
42:42 Event: Kick-off by Inter
43:15 Event: Foul by Inter
43:30 Caption: Mateo Kovacic (Inter) is obviously not following the Golden Rule: „Treat others as you want to be treated.“ He makes a bad challenge and leaves Daniele Doveri with no other option than to blow for a foul.
43:36 Event: Indirect free-kick by Juventus
43:55 Event: Ball out of play
44:02 Event: Throw-in by Juventus
44:19 Event: Ball out of play
44:38 Event: Throw-in by Juventus
44:41 Event: Ball out of play
44:47 Event: Throw-in by Juventus
44:50 Caption: Stephan Lichtsteiner (Juventus) tries his luck with a shot from long range, but his effort is well blocked by one of the defending players.
45:10 Caption: The match has reached half-time.
45:59 Caption: This is how football should be - full of action, thrilling moments and spectacular opportunities. And we have only had the first 45 minutes, so the expectations for the second half are high. The first half was definitely edged by the home side. The home side are keeping possession of the ball with some short passes, while the visitors are waiting to open up their defence and hit them swiftly on the break.

Second Half:
00:00 Event: Kick-off by Inter
00:01 Caption: The second half has just started.
00:27 Event: Shots off target by Juventus
00:28 Event: Ball out of play
00:30 Caption: Alvaro Morata (Juventus) decides to keep the ball to himself and weaves through the defence into the box. From there he takes a shot which goes narrowly wide of the target. The ball is off of the pitch and it's a goal kick for Inter.
00:39 Event: Clearance by Inter
00:55 Caption: Great ball in from Stephan Lichtsteiner. Alvaro Morata (Juventus) should really have done better with a close-range header, but he heads it a whisker wide of the left post. The ball is off of the pitch and it's a goal kick for Inter.
00:58 Event: Ball out of play
01:20 Event: Clearance by Inter

02:48 Event: Indirect free-kick by Juventus

03:12 Caption: Mateo Kovacic (Inter) is first to the rebound but his shot is blocked. Wow, what an escape there for the opposition.
03:30 Caption: Gary Medel (Inter) makes a yard for himself and goes for goal from long range. It never troubles the goalkeeper as it flies into the stands. The ball goes out of play and Juventus will have a goal kick.
03:39 Event: Shots on target by Inter
03:57 Event: Shots off target by Inter

05:38 Event: Clearance by Juventus
05:47 Event: Ball out of play

07:12 Caption: Marcelo Brozovic (Inter) takes the free kick and immediately restarts play with a short pass.
07:27 Event: Indirect free-kick by Inter

09:40 Event: Ball out of play

12:51 Event: Ball out of play
12:54 Caption: Mauro Icardi (Inter) races towards goal but the defender gets back well to make a challenge. The referee points to the corner flag and Inter will take a corner.

13:20 Event: Corner by Inter

15:51 Event: Ball out of play
16:12 Event: Throw-in by Juventus

16:35 Event: Indirect free-kick by Juventus

21:42 Event: Foul by Inter
21:49 Caption: Juan Jesus (Inter) performs a sliding tackle but catches his opponent's legs. The referee blows his whistle for an infringement. Juventus have a free kick.

23:55 Caption: Mauro Icardi (Inter) has an effort from distance and sends the ball towards the bottom right corner, but the goalkeeper is equal to it.
25:24 Event: Shots off target by Inter

25:57 Caption: Yuto Nagatomo (Inter) joins the action as a substitute, replacing Xherdan Shaqiri.

28:54 Caption: Roberto Pereyra (Juventus) is being forced to leave the pitch in order to receive medical treatment and his team will play with a man short for a few minutes.
29:40 Caption: Mateo Kovacic (Inter) overhits the corner kick and none of his teammates can their head on it.
29:45 Caption: Roberto Pereyra (Juventus) hasn't suffered any serious injury which would see him leave the pitch. He's back in the game now.

32:45 Event: Substitution by Juventus
32:52 Event: Throw-in by Inter

34:03 Event: Ball out of play

34:36 Caption: Marcelo Brozovic (Inter) collects a pass and strikes from about 20 metres out. It's a poor attempt which flies well wide of the left post. The ball goes out of play and Juventus will have a goal kick.
34:43 Event: Foul by Inter
34:55 Caption: Danilo D'Ambrosio (Inter) is penalised for holding. Daniele Doveri signals a set piece. There is a free kick near the sideline to Juventus.
35:17 Caption: Claudio Marchisio (Juventus) takes the resulting free kick from outside the box. He sends a nice cross into the box, but his intention is well anticipated by the goalkeeper who comes out to collect the ball.
35:35 Event: Indirect free-kick by Juventus
36:06 Event: Ball out of play
36:06 Caption: Mauro Icardi (Inter) connects with a cross from the side, but produces a header which goes miles wide of the right post. The ball is off of the pitch and it's a goal kick for Juventus.
36:30 Event: Substitution by Inter
36:41 Event: Clearance by Juventus
36:52 Caption: The game has come to an end for Marcelo Brozovic. He has contributed as much as he could today. He will be replaced by the fresh legs of Lukas Podolski (Inter).
37:19 Event: Shots on target by Juventus
37:20 Event: Goal by Juventus
37:44 Caption: The ball rebounds and arrives at the feet of Alvaro Morata (Juventus) just outside the box. He doesn't think twice and fires a brilliant shot into the bottom left corner. His attempt was beyond the reach of Samir Handanovic. 1:1.
38:25 Caption: Nice individual effort by Rodrigo Palacio (Inter). He gets all the way through to the keeper and hits a low drive to the bottom right corner, but Marco Storari does a good job to anticipate the direction of the ball and keeps it out.
38:26 Event: Kick-off by Inter
38:59 Event: Shots on target by Inter
39:01 Event: Shots on target by Inter
39:02 Event: Ball out of play
39:26 Event: Corner by Inter
39:31 Event: Ball out of play
39:37 Caption: Mauro Icardi (Inter) is quickest to the rebound inside the box and produces a sweet strike towards the right side of the goal. Nevertheless, the goalkeeper pulls off a spectacular save to keep the ball out of the net. Great goalkeeping! Inter will have a chance to score from a corner kick.
39:55 Caption: Lukas Podolski (Inter) steps up to take the corner, but the ball just sails in among the defenders.
39:56 Event: Clearance by Juventus
40:07 Event: Foul by Inter
40:22 Caption: Nemanja Vidic (Inter) makes a strong challenge and Daniele Doveri blows for a foul. Juventus quickly take the free kick with a short pass.
40:46 Event: Indirect free-kick by Juventus
40:56 Event: Foul by Inter
41:10 Caption: Handball by Yuto Nagatomo (Inter). Juventus are given an advantage. They have a free kick.
41:25 Event: Indirect free-kick by Juventus
41:28 Event: Ball out of play

41:38 Caption: Claudio Marchisio (Juventus) will take the free kick.
41:43 Caption: Alvaro Morata (Juventus) leaps high deep inside the box to meet a beautiful cross from the resultant free kick. He glances a header goalwards, but it's not accurate and goes narrowly wide of the left post. The ball goes out of play and Inter will have a goal kick.
41:53 Event: Throw-in by Inter
42:49 Caption: Yuto Nagatomo (Inter) produces a quality cross into the box, but the opposition's defence intercepts the ball and spanks it away.
43:08 Event: Offside by Inter
43:10 Caption: Lukas Podolski (Inter) is flagged for offside.
43:14 Caption: Substitution. Assane Gnoukouri (Inter) replaces Andrea Ranocchia.
43:38 Event: Substitution by Inter
43:45 Event: Indirect free-kick by Juventus
44:07 Event: Foul by Juventus
44:10 Caption: Dangerous play by Paul Pogba (Juventus). Daniele Doveri blows his whistle for a foul.
44:11 Event: Indirect free-kick by Inter
44:23 Event: Ball out of play
44:27 Event: Throw-in by Inter
45:38 Caption: Assane Gnoukouri (Inter) was too fierce in his attempt to get the ball from his opponent and Daniele Doveri blows for a foul.
46:25 Caption: Romulo (Juventus) swings a cross into the box, but it's far too close to Samir Handanovic, who smothers the ball.
46:50 Caption: Mauro Icardi (Inter) fails to find any of his teammates inside the box as his pass is blocked. The ball goes out of play and Inter have been awarded a corner kick.
47:19 Caption: Mateo Kovacic (Inter) takes the resulting corner which is well defended.
47:38 Caption: Yuto Nagatomo (Inter) found some space to play in a lofted pass, but he looks disappointed as none of his teammates managed to connect with it.
49:08 Caption: A clumsy foul by Fernando Llorente (Juventus) and Daniele Doveri blows his whistle. A free kick to Inter.
49:37 Caption: Mateo Kovacic (Inter) whips the ball in from the long-range free kick, but the first man gets it clear.
50:05 Caption: The referee blows for the end of today's match.
50:59 Caption: It was an attractive offensive game and the fans have no reason to be upset. Great display from the home side, you have to say that they were the better side today. The hosts displayed good teamplay with a lot of passes. The visiting side patiently waited in their own half to dispossess the opponent and hit them on the break.
    

    #######TASK 
    Provide a factually correct and detailed textual description of the game compiled from the information presented above from different sources, in more than 1000 words.
            "Cap:": represents the captions published in the online portal usually within 30 seconds of the event.
            "E:" represents events recorded exactly after the event happened.
    Don't mention sources of information like commentators or captions, write as if you saw them live.
summary:
In an electrifying Serie A encounter, Inter Milan faced off against Juventus, with the match ending 1-2 in favor of the visitors. The clash was marked by intense action and pivotal moments, showcasing a blend of skillful play, tactical nous, and dramatic twists. Here’s an extensive narration of how the match unfolded.

As the referee signaled the start of the game, Juventus took the kick-off and began to assert their authority early. However, almost immediately, the game saw its first disruption—Juventus committed a foul within the first 16 seconds. Inter was quick to capitalize on this early infringement, gaining possession through an indirect free-kick.

In the very first minute, Inter demonstrated their intent by firing a shot on target, but the effort soon came to naught as the ball went out of play. The subsequent corner and additional attacking endeavors did not bear fruit for Inter. On the other hand, Juventus managed to have a couple of shots off target around the two-minute mark, but neither attempt troubled the Inter goalkeeper, Samir Handanovic.

Inter's vigorous pressing paid off in the 8th minute when they managed to take the lead. A well-executed play resulted in a shot on target, culminating in a goal that sent the Nerazzurri faithful into raptures. The goal injected new energy into Inter’s attack, with Xherdan Shaqiri delivering brilliant crosses into the penalty area and generating more attacking opportunities. Despite their dominance, Inter couldn’t extend their lead; their attempts were either off-target or effectively cleared by Juventus’ defense.

As Juventus endeavored to find their rhythm, they faced stern resistance from Inter’s defense. Alvaro Morata came close for Juventus with a powerful shot from the edge of the box, but Handanovic pulled off a crucial save to maintain Inter’s lead. Juventus, persistent as ever, won a series of corners and kept probing Inter’s defense, but were repeatedly thwarted.

The complexion of the game changed dramatically at the 41st-minute mark when a foul by Nemanja Vidic on a Juventus player led to a penalty. Claudio Marchisio stepped up to take the spot-kick and calmly slotted it into the bottom left corner, leveling the score at 1-1. The goal came as a relief for Juventus, resonating with their fans.

With the first half drawing to a close, tensions flared as several fouls were committed, resulting in multiple yellow cards for both sides. Heading into halftime, the game was evenly poised at one goal apiece.

As the second half commenced, Inter kicked off proceedings with renewed vigor. Juventus’ Morata quickly got into action with an audacious run into the box, but his shot went narrowly wide of the target. Inter responded in kind, and the game's tempo increased as both teams sought to seize control.

Gary Medel and Marcelo Brozovic were particularly active for Inter, pulling the strings in midfield and making incisive passes to create opportunities. Inter’s relentless pursuit of the lead saw them register numerous shots both on and off target, but they were unable to break the deadlock. Marco Storari, Juventus’ goalkeeper, was in fine form, making crucial saves to deny Inter on several occasions.

Juventus’ defensive solidity was complemented by their counter-attacking prowess. In the 55th minute, a piece of individual brilliance from Alvaro Morata sealed the fate of the match. Morata received a rebounded ball just outside the box and fired an unstoppable shot into the bottom left corner, putting Juventus ahead 2-1.

Despite the setback, Inter refused to relent. Substitutions were made to inject fresh legs into the game, with Lukas Podolski and Yuto Nagatomo coming on to bolster the attack. Podolski immediately made his presence felt by taking sharp corners and creating chances. However, Juventus’ defense held firm, repelling wave after wave of Inter’s onslaughts.

In the dying minutes of the match, Inter’s desperation was evident as they pushed men forward in search of an equalizer. Mauro Icardi came close to scoring with powerful attempts that tested Storari, yet fortune did not favor the home side. Juventus maintained their defensive structure and managed the game through intelligent play and ball retention.

The final whistle blew, ending the match with Juventus sealing a hard-fought 2-1 victory over Inter Milan. The game was characterized by its intensity, tactical battles, and moments of individual brilliance.

Inter, though disappointed with the result, showed determination and creativity, often laying siege to Juventus’ goal. Juventus, on the other hand, exhibited resilience and clinical finishing, ensuring they left San Siro with all three points.

This encounter highlighted everything fans love about football—strategic play, dramatic goals, and unwavering passion from both sets of players. In the end, it was Juventus’ clinical edge that made the difference, leaving Inter to rue missed opportunities and contemplate what might have been. The thrilling contest added another captivating chapter to the storied rivalry between these two Italian giants.
